abstract: A lawyer for General Electric, Lorene F. Schaefer, has filed a lawsuit in Federal District Court in Connecticut, accusing G.E. of systematically discriminating against women in both pay and promotions.
lead_paragraph: A lawyer for General Electric, Lorene F. Schaefer, has filed a lawsuit in Federal District Court in Connecticut, accusing G.E. of systematically discriminating against women in both pay and promotions.

headline.main: Lawyer Files Bias Suit Against G.E
